Title: Relates to the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor or governor and the powers and duties of such offices
Summary: Relates to the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor or governor and the powers and duties of such offices; establishes the committee on gubernatorial disability.
LawCode: Amd Art 4 §§5 & 6, add §9, amd Art 6 §24, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 4 and article 6 of the constitution, in relation to the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor or governor and the powers and duties of such offices
